column14: [Illustration] The Frog [Illustration]           Be kind and tender to the Frog,               And do not call him names,           As 'Slimy skin,' or 'Polly-wog,'               Or likewise 'Ugly James,'           Or 'Gap-a-grin,' or 'Toad-gone-wrong,'               Or 'Bill Bandy-knees':           The Frog is justly sensitive               To epithets like these.
